title: Bug 3970 - [preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files
description: Bug 3970 - [preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files. The Windows workstations are used as X terminals and to run Eclipse, as PC's are cheaper than Unix boxes.
OB: The default line delimiters for new files are not defined in the preferences UI.
EB: The preferences UI should have an option to define the default line delimiters for new files.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the preferences UI.
2. Navigate to the relevant section for defining line delimiters.
3. Observe that there is no option to define the default line delimiters for new files.
4. Expect the UI to have an option to define the default line delimiters for new files.
